description: Maximum invalid connection attempts. The maximum_invalid_connect_attempts parameter in SAP HANA specifies the maximum number of failed logon attempts that are possible; the user is locked as soon as this number is reached. Recommendation is to set maximum_invalid_connect_attempts to 6 or higher.

queries.name: q_password_policy_maximum_invalid_connect_attempts
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'maximum_invalid_connect_attempts'

actions.description: The maximum_invalid_connect_attempts parameter is currently set to a value of less than 6(default recommended value). Please set the value of maximum_invalid_connect_attempts to 6 or higher.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
